For-loop_key3: When this loop runs the first time, the value of i is 0, 0<3 is true, and it is incremented due to i++, i value will become 1, therefore i is printed
For-loop_key4: When this loop runs the second time, the value of i is 1, 1<3 is true, and it is incremented due to i++,i value will become 2, therefore i is printed
For-loop_key5: When this loop runs the third time, the value of i is 2, 2<3 is true, and it is incremented due to i++,i value will become 3, therefore i is printed
For-loop_key6: When this loop runs the fourth time, the value of i is 3. Clearly, 3<3, so the for loop will stop.
For-loop_key7: When we are using a for loop, we can in one line initialize the variable, give the condition, and increment or decrement the variable. For loop runs for a specific number of times.
For-loop_key10: When this loop runs the first time, the value of n is 9, n>0 is true, and it is decremented due to n--, n value will become 8, therefore i is printed
For-loop_key11: When this loop runs the second time, the value of n is 8, n>0 is true, and it is decremented due to n--,n value will become 7, therefore i is printed
For-loop_key12: When this loop runs the third time, the value of n is 7, n>0 is true, and it is decremented due to n--, n value will become 6, therefore i is printed
For-loop_key13: When this loop runs the fourth time, the value of n is 6, n>0 is true, and it is decremented due to n--, n value will become 5, therefore i is printed
For-loop_key19: When this loop runs the tenth time, the value of n is 0, 0>0 is false, and the loop breaks.

For-loop_key23: When this loop runs the second time, the value of i is 26, 26<=30 is true, and it is incremented due to i++,i value will become 27, therefore 26 is printed
For-loop_key24: When this loop runs the third time, the value of i is 27, 27<=30 is true, and it is incremented due to i++,i value will become 28, therefore 27 is printed
For-loop_key25: When this loop runs the third time, the value of i is 28, 28<=30 is true, and it is incremented due to i++,i value will become 29, therefore 28 is printed
For-loop_key26: When this loop runs the third time, the value of i is 29, 29<=30 is true, and it is incremented due to i++,i value will become 30, therefore 29 is printed
For-loop_key27: When this loop runs the third time, the value of i is 30, 30<=30 is true, and it is incremented due to i++,i value will become 31, therefore 30 is printed
